snippet: A state appeals court refused Wednesday to reinstate two money-laundering convictions against Tom DeLay, the former House majority leader.
abstract: Texas state appeals court refuses to reinstate two money-laundering convictions against Tom DeLay, the former House majority leader.
lead_paragraph: A state appeals court refused Wednesday to reinstate two money-laundering convictions against Tom DeLay, the former House majority leader.

headline.main: Texas: Reversal of DeLay’s Conviction Upheld
headline.print_headline: Texas: Reversal of DeLay Conviction Upheld
